title: New Patch Glitch - I need help fixing
body:
Yesterday I **updated my client to patch 7.11** and played a match and in the loading screen it had no background it was only black and all the champion cards. Once I got in game I saw that **all my teams health bars were black and the enemy's health bars were also black** the epic monsters also had their health number blacked out. I let my computer restart after the game thinking that it would fix it self but i have played a game today and nothing had changed the glitches were still there. So today I have **uninstalled League and Reinstalled it** to get rid of the problem and it **has not worked**. If anyone knows a way I could fix this please tell me.

Links below are to what i am talking about.

[Loading Screen](http://imgur.com/a/wglCC)
[In Game Health Bars](http://imgur.com/a/b2F7p)
[Epic Monsters Helath Bars](http://imgur.com/a/LxRbF)

replies.body: do many other people have this problem

Umm yeah I have the same problem... I was actually playing mid when this Xin Zhao came outta nowhere and spo0ked the heck out of me... I then panicked and flashed into the raptors thinking that he would knock me out, buuuuut it turned out to be an ally. Man I have been having problems all day, sorry I couldn't help mate... Good luck in the rift{{champion:105}} {{item:3089}}
Were you able to find a solution?
at the moment no but i am waiting for the new patch to update and see if that fixes the problem.

So i think i have found a way to fix my problem but... there is a problem L.S.I. (League Summoner Information) is a 3rd Party program and when i searched for it a few board posts said that they had been banned for using it can anyone confirm that L.S.I. is a legal 3rd Party software. Why would i use it? You can change the health bar colors to whatever you like and i think this will 100% fix the problem but i will not install it if it has the possible chance of getting me banned.

Far more likely you simply need to update your graphics drivers. You never have to install 3rd party software to fix a bug like this, and often they can cause more problems than they solve since they aren't officially supported.
Hi. I updated the drivers and this did not fix the problem but i did have a problem updating my "Sound and Video Game Contollers" so i think this is my problem. thanks

Failing that, someone else did mention that turning off vsync fixed the issue. Obviously it's not ideal, but if it's not an issue with your client then likely that will work as a temporary fix until the next patch hopefully fixes it properly.

Hey there,

Could you try [initiating a full repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) for me, let me know if this helps.

i tried doing a full repair and it did not help
